projects.description: Perfect for cones and large joints. The BIGGIN' has the largest volume for delivering superior experience.
projects.title: BIG BOY
MIDWAY
projects.description: Considered the ideal size by many. The MIDWAY provides improved flavor, cooler smoke, and fewer coughs

projects.title: SLIMJIM
projects.description: The SLIMJIM comes only half-filled with activated carbon, resulting in a more robust taste. With its 6 mm size, it's the smallest member of the DAS FILTER family.
